sections.heading: of water rights; appeal.An appeal may be taken from the decision of the Chief Water Officer upon such hearing as provided by section 61-207

sections.text:
46-229.05.Adjudication of water rights; appeal.

An appeal may be taken from the decision of the Chief Water Officer upon such hearing as provided by section 61-207.

SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. VII, art. V, div. 2, § 9, p. 837;C.S.1922, § 8428;C.S.1929, § 81-6309;R.S.1943, § 46-229;Laws 1947, c. 172, § 1(6), p. 522;Laws 1991, LB 732, § 106;Laws 2000, LB 900, § 101;Laws 2025, LB317, § 81.Operative Date: July 1, 2025

Annotations

This section does not violate constitutional notions of due process. In re Water Appropriation Nos. 442A, 461, 462, and 485, 210 Neb. 161, 313 N.W.2d 271 (1981).
